spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent. Doors and windows are located correctly in relation to floor plan partitions, though there is minor distortion in the depth of the center-right bedroom suite.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are modeled with consistent thickness and all rooms from the 2D blueprint are present. No major hallucinations detected in structural components.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture types to their designated spots. Scale of the central dining set is slightly reduced compared to the 2D plan representation.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Professional isometric render with clean geometry and soft shadows. Minimal aliasing and clear orthographic perspective.

detected_errors.description: Minor proportion distortion in the central dining area; table and chairs appear smaller relative to the room floor space than depicted in the blue-print.
Orientation error for the rug/table in the far left terrace area; the 3D model slightly rotates the furniture set compared to the strict parallel alignment in the 2D plan.
